categories.title: Game of the Year
categories.description: Recognizing a game that delivers the absolute best experience across all creative and technical fields.

categories.title: Best Narrative
categories.description: For outstanding storytelling and narrative development in a game.

categories.title: Best Score and Music
categories.description: For outstanding music, inclusive of score, original song and/or licensed soundtrack.

categories.title: Innovation in Accessibility
categories.description: Recognizing software and/or hardware that is pushing the medium forward by adding features, technology and content to help games be played and enjoyed by an even wider audience.

categories.title: Best VR / AR
categories.description: For the best game experience playable in virtual or augmented reality, irrespective of platform.

categories.title: Best Action Game
categories.description: For the best game in the action genre focused primarily on combat.

categories.title: Best Fighting
categories.description: For the best game designed primarily around head-to-head combat.

categories.title: Best Sports / Racing
categories.description: For the best traditional and non-traditional sports and racing game.
